report.title: Shorewatch Reporting: Effort summary
report.description: A list of locations, plus effort based summary data, broken down by year and optionally month and/or user. All data or just this year's.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l2.id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM s1.date_start) AS year, CASE #month_breakdown# WHEN 0 THEN NULL ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM s1.date_start) END AS month, CASE #observer_functionality_flag# WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE (p.first_name||' '||p.surname) END AS observer, COUNT(distinct s1.id) AS number_watches, COUNT(distinct s1.created_by_id) AS number_observers, COUNT(distinct sav1.id) AS number_cetacean_watches, COUNT(distinct sav2.id) AS number_non_cetacean_watches, SUM(sav3.int_value) AS number_people_spoken_to, string_agg(distinct co.taxon || ' (' || co.preferred_taxon || ')', ',') as species_seen FROM locations l2 LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l2.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN samples s1 ON s1.location_id=l2.id AND s1.deleted=false AND s1.sample_method_id = #effort_sample_method_id# AND (#current_year# = 0 OR EXTRACT(YEAR FROM s1.date_start) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM now())) AND (#observer_functionality_flag# <= 0 OR s1.created_by_id = #observer_functionality_flag#) LEFT JOIN users u ON s1.created_by_id = u.id LEFT JOIN people p ON u.person_id = p.id LEFT JOIN samples s2 ON s2.parent_id = s1.id AND s2.deleted = false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id=s1.id AND sav1.deleted=false AND sav1.sample_attribute_id = #cetaceans_seen_attr_id# AND sav1.int_value = #seen_yes_id# LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav2 ON sav2.sample_id=s1.id AND sav2.deleted=false AND sav2.sample_attribute_id = #non_cetaceans_seen_attr_id# AND sav2.int_value = #seen_yes_id# LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav3 ON sav3.sample_id=s1.id AND sav3.deleted=false AND sav3.sample_attribute_id = #speak_to_attr_id# LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences co ON co.location_id = l2.id AND co.sample_id = s2.id #joins# WHERE l2.deleted=false AND #website_filter# #filters# GROUP BY l2.id, year, month, CASE #observer_functionality_flag# WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE (p.first_name||' '||p.surname) END ) AS ldata ON ldata.id=l1.id

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: effort_sample_method_id
param.description: Select the effort sample method. Mandatory.

param.name: cetaceans_seen_attr_id
param.description: Select the sample attribute which holds the "cetaceans seen" flag (this parameter is the attribute id, not the caption). Mandatory. This must be a lookup list attrbute - yes/no.

param.name: non_cetaceans_seen_attr_id
param.description: Select the non-cetacean marine mammal seen sample attribute (this parameter is the attribute id, not the caption). Mandatory. This must be a lookup list attrbute - yes/no.

param.name: speak_to_attr_id
param.display: Number of people spoken to attribute
param.description: Select the Number of people spoken to sample attribute (this parameter is the attribute id, not the caption). Mandatory. This must be an integer attrbute.

param.name: seen_yes_id
param.description: Select the yes term used by the two seen attributes (this parameter is the id, not the caption). Mandatory.

param.name: current_year
param.description: Optional boolean: value 0 (default) to include all data, value 1 to included only the current year.

param.name: month_breakdown
param.description: Optional boolean: value 0 (default) to only breakdown data by year, value 1 to break down the data further to month granularity.

param.name: observer_functionality_flag
param.description: Select observer functionality. Optional. -1 breaks down data by observer who created the effort, 0 (default if not provided) ignores observer, positive number filters by that observer.

column.name: number_non_cetacean_watches
column.display: Number of non-cetacean marine mammal positive watches

column.name: number_people_spoken_to
column.display: Number of people spoken to during the watches
